CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ispickval (Activite_commerciale_principale__c ,"23"), ispickval (Activite_commerciale_principale__c ,"31"), ispickval (Activite_commerciale_principale__c ,"36"), ispickval (Activite_commerciale_principale__c ,"42"), ispickval (Activite_commerciale_principale__c ,"49"), ispickval (Activite_commerciale_principale__c ,"67"), ispickval (Activite_commerciale_principale__c ,"73"), ispickval (Activite_commerciale_principale__c ,"76"), ispickval (Activite_commerciale_principale__c ,"87"), ispickval (Activite_commerciale_principale__c ,"91"), ispickval (Activite_commerciale_principale__c ,"66"), ispickval (Activite_commerciale_principale__c ,"81"), ispickval (Activite_commerciale_principale__c ,"3342"), ispickval (Industry,"2") ), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "Red"), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "Green"))
CustomField.label: Activité commerciale éligible
